item.title: 巴西卢拉表示不想在中美贸易战中做出选择
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）不想在美国和中国之间做出选择，因为全球最大的两个经济体之间不断升级的贸易战正迫使巴西这样的国家选择站在哪一边。【原文：Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has no desire to choose between the US and China as an escalating trade fight between the planet’s two largest economies pushes nations like his own to pick a side.】

item.title: 3.73 亿美元空头押注后，看跌 ETF 警报大作
item.description: 一群 ETF 交易员正在押注股市不会出现大幅反弹，因为他们要为空头头寸买单，并从看涨策略中撤出资金。【原文：A group of ETF traders are betting against a spirited rebound in the stock market, as they pay up for short positions and withdraw money from bullish strategies.】

item.title: 阿根廷 2 月份经济增长超出预期
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱总统与国际货币基金组织达成 200 亿美元协议一周后，阿根廷 2 月份的经济增长超过预期，巩固了该国在哈维尔-米莱总统领导下的反弹势头。【原文：Argentina’s economy grew more than expected in February, solidifying the country’s bounceback under President Javier Milei a week after he clinched a $20 billion deal with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 巴克莱首席执行官预计美元仍将是世界储备货币
item.description: 巴克莱银行首席执行官 C.S. Venkatakrishnan 表示，即使在特朗普政府的关税政策造成经济动荡的情况下，美元 "绝对 "仍将是全球唯一的储备货币。【原文：The US dollar will “absolutely” remain the world’s only reserve currency, Barclays Plc Chief Executive Officer C.S. Venkatakrishnan said, even amid economic upheaval created by the Trump administration’s tariff policies.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数反弹令交易员担心市场再次出现头部假象
item.description: 周二股市反弹，华尔街专业人士向急于重返股市的投资者发出警告：在长期下跌过程中，要谨防 "假摔"。【原文：Wall Street pros have a warning for investors eager to jump back into the stock market as it rebounds Tuesday: Watch out for headfakes in the middle of a longer-term decline.】

item.title: 闪电侠从阴影中现身，重整股票交易秩序
item.description:
在本已支离破碎的交易环境中，新订单引发了对透明度和流动性的担忧。【原文：

The new order is stirring concerns over transparency and liquidity in an already fragmented trading landscape.

item.title: 特斯拉第一季度盈利分析
item.description: 日本东京的特斯拉经销店。摄影师：Shoko Takayasu/Bloomberg【原文：A Tesla dealership in Tokyo, Japan. Photographer: Shoko Takayasu/Bloomberg】

item.title: 马斯克的 DOGE 削减打击深度伪造和虚假信息的资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府效率部（Department of Government Efficiency）正在削减美国国家科学基金会（National Science Foundation）约 1.35 亿美元的研究补助资金，该基金会是支持人工智能开发的重要联邦机构。【原文：Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency is slashing about $135 million in funding for research grants from the National Science Foundation, a key federal agency supporting artificial intelligence development, according to people familiar with the matter and an internal document viewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 卡什卡利称美联储必须确保关税通胀不会持续
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，央行的职责是确保关税不会刺激持续的通胀问题，这与美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）最近的言论不谋而合。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said it’s the central bank’s job to make sure tariffs don’t spur an ongoing inflation problem, echoing recent comments by Fed Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: ChatGPT 首席执行官称，OpenAI 将收购谷歌的 Chrome 浏览器
item.description: ChatGPT公司负责人周二在法庭听证会上表示，如果联邦法院下令分拆谷歌Chrome浏览器，OpenAI将有兴趣收购该公司。【原文：OpenAI would be interested in buying Google’s Chrome browser if a federal court orders it to be spun off, the head of ChatGPT said in a court hearing Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁称，如果关税不确定性持续存在，经济衰退风险将上升
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁警告说，如果美国主导的贸易战的不确定性继续拖下去，全球经济衰退的可能性将上升。【原文：The head of International Monetary Fund warned that the chances of global recession will rise if uncertainty over a US-led trade war continues to drag.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称欧元 "几年后 "可能成为替代储备货币
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，如果欧洲加大一体化力度，欧元可能成为美元的替代储备货币。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said the euro could become an alternative to the dollar as a reserve currency if Europe increases its integration efforts.】

item.title: 菲律宾货币局局长认为贸易战恶化将带来更多宽松政策
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长表示，随着美国关税和市场不确定性使菲律宾经济前景恶化，菲律宾可能将进一步放宽货币政策。【原文：The Philippines will probably ease monetary policy further as US tariffs and market uncertainty worsen its economic prospects, according to the country’s central bank governor.】

item.title: 美国输往亚洲的液化天然气七个月来首次超过输往欧洲的货物
item.description: 根据分析公司 Spark Commodities 的数据，液化天然气贸易商在亚洲销售美国液化天然气货物比在欧洲销售这种燃料更有利可图。【原文：Liquefied natural gas traders can make a better profit from selling US LNG cargoes in Asia than offering the fuel in Europe, an opportunity that opened up for the first time in seven months, according to data from analytics firm Spark Commodities.】

item.title: 肯尼亚将超越埃塞俄比亚成为东非最大经济体
item.description: 在比尔贬值之后，国际货币基金组织表示，肯尼亚的经济今年将超过埃塞俄比亚，成为东非最大的经济体。【原文：Kenya’s economy is set to surpass Ethiopia’s to become East Africa’s largest this year, the International Monetary Fund said, after the birr was devalued.】

item.title: 聊天GPT负责人称搜索对谷歌试验中的OpenAI至关重要
item.description: OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 产品负责人周二在谷歌反垄断审判中作证说，没有搜索技术，OpenAI 打造 "超级助手 "应用和实现通用人工智能的目标就不会成功，但谷歌拒绝与这家初创公司合作。【原文：OpenAI’s goals of building a “super assistant” app and reaching general artificial intelligence won’t succeed without search technology but Google has declined to work with the startup, the head of its ChatGPT product testified Tuesday in the Google antitrust trial.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划采取税收激励措施促进投资、推动增长
item.description: 尼日利亚计划为投资于农业和能源等西非国家关键经济部门的企业提供税收优惠，以促进经济增长。【原文：Nigeria plans to offer tax incentives to firms investing in key sectors of the West African nation’s economy such as agriculture and energy to boost growth.】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司为其在加拿大的最后一座矿山寻找买家
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp. ）正寻求出售其在加拿大的最后一座矿山，以充分利用创纪录的金价和人们对北美采矿业务的新兴趣。【原文：Barrick Gold Corp. is looking to sell its last mine in Canada in a push to capitalize on record gold prices and a renewed interest in North American mining operations.】

item.title: 智利总统竞选者凯泽尔誓言带来经济震撼
item.description: 智利右翼总统候选人约翰内斯-凯泽尔（Johannes Kaiser）说，如果他当选领导拉丁美洲最富有的国家之一，他将立即采取行动减税并缩小政府规模。【原文：Chile right-wing presidential hopeful Johannes Kaiser said he’d move urgently to cut taxes and reduce the size of government if elected to lead one of Latin America’s richest nations.】

item.title: Sycamore 的冈田认为美国经济衰退 "可能性大于非可能性
item.description: Sycamore Tree Capital Partners 公司首席执行官马克-冈田（Mark Okada）表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策对美国经济造成压力，美国经济衰退的 "可能性大于不可能"。【原文：A US recession is “more likely than not” as President Donald Trump’s policies weigh on an economy that has stood out for its strength, said Mark Okada, chief executive officer of Sycamore Tree Capital Partners.】

item.title: 西方投资者在沉寂三年后涌入黄金市场
item.description: 西方投资者在过去三年基本缺席黄金市场之后，终于重返黄金市场。这一次，他们大举购买以金条为支持的交易所交易产品。【原文：Western investors are finally back in the gold market after being largely absent for the past three years. This time, they’re coming in force with big purchases of bullion-backed exchange-traded products.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为全球增长更依赖于中国和印度
item.description: 由于贸易战不断升级，国际货币基金组织下调了对全球经济增长的预测，预计中国和印度这两个世界上人口最多的国家将在推动全球经济发展方面发挥更大作用。【原文：The International Monetary Fund expects China and India — the world’s most populous countries — to play a bigger role driving the global economy, as it downgrades growth forecasts due to an escalating trade war.】

item.title: 贝森特表示愿意向阿根廷提供信贷额度
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，如果全球冲击危及阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的经济转机，特朗普政府愿意向阿根廷政府提供特定的信贷额度。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration would be willing to offer Argentina’s government a specific credit line if a global shock jeopardized President Javier Milei’s economic turnaround, according to three people with direct knowledge of his comments.】

item.title: Instagram 推出视频编辑应用吸引 TikTok 创作者
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 旗下的 Instagram 部门周二推出了一款新的视频编辑应用，这家社交媒体网站正试图从 TikTok 吸引创作者。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s Instagram unit rolled out a new video-editing app Tuesday, as the social media site seeks to lure creators from TikTok.】

item.title: 西班牙 Colonial 公司与石盾公司共同投资欧洲实验室空间项目
item.description: Inmobiliaria Colonial Socimi SA 同意与 Stoneshield Capital 合作，为欧洲的科技创新企业开发租赁空间。【原文：Inmobiliaria Colonial Socimi SA agreed to partner with Stoneshield Capital to develop rental space for science and innovation businesses across Europe.】

item.title: 芝加哥交易所追逐明尼阿波利斯小麦合约名家
item.description: 争夺春小麦霸主的战斗已经打响。【原文：The battle for spring-wheat supremacy has begun.】

item.title: 关税引发 "爱国主义 "重启，基金市场受到冲击
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动关税战后，全球最大的几家资产管理公司的客户正争先恐后地将资金从美国转移到欧洲基金。【原文：Clients at some of the world’s biggest asset managers are racing to move money away from the US and into European funds in the wake of Donald Trump’s tariff war.】

item.title: 苹果新任 Siri 首席执行官招募 Vision Pro 人才，开始东山再起之路
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）新任 Siri 工程主管正在全面改革领导开发饱受困扰的语音助手的管理团队，他向员工保证，这一举措将为公司的成功奠定基础。【原文：Apple Inc.’s new Siri engineering chief is overhauling the management team leading development of the beleaguered voice assistant, taking a step he assured employees would set the company up for success.】

item.title: 闪灵 "酒店借贷 3 亿美元迎合恐怖片粉丝需求
item.description: 这家曾启发斯蒂芬-金写下畅销书《闪灵》的酒店正在求助于市政债券市场来支付大修费用，以巩固其在电影业的地位，尤其是在恐怖片爱好者中的地位。【原文：The hotel that inspired Stephen King to write his bestsellerThe Shining is turning to the municipal-bond market to pay for a sweeping overhaul in a bid to cement its status in the film industry, particularly among horror aficionados.】

item.title: Instagram 联合创始人称没有 Meta 应用程序也能蓬勃发展
item.description: Instagram 联合创始人凯文-西斯特罗姆（Kevin Systrom）作证说，如果没有被 Meta Platforms 公司收购，他刚刚起步的照片分享应用本可以取得成功，但首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）最终将 Instagram 的发展视为 "威胁"，并剥夺了它的资源。【原文：Instagram co-founder Kevin Systrom testified that his fledgling photo-sharing app could have succeeded without being acquired by Meta Platforms Inc., and that eventually Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg treated Instagram’s growth as a “threat” and starved it of resources.】
